name: 2048 Pro - A Tiny Puzzle Challenge Game
name_original: 2048 Pro - A Tiny Puzzle Challenge Game
description:
Can't stop playing this game.

2048 is a tiny puzzle that grow on you.

How to play:
1. Swipe to move all numbers.
2. Add same number to grow up.
3. Try your best to get 2048.

This game is inspired by "Threes!" and Gabrielle Cirulli game at
http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/.
